gen:link.msg:message: `CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow` aan het begin van de voorgaande periode MOET minimaal één keer voorkomen.

`CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow` aan het einde van de periode MOET gelijk zijn aan `CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow` aan het begin van de periode + `IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents` + `ChangesShortTermCashAndCashEquivalents`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1PeriodStart02MutationsPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1PeriodStart02MutationsPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1PeriodStart02MutationsPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1PeriodStart02MutationsPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1PeriodStart02MutationsPeriodEnd1_Mutation01IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1PeriodStart02MutationsPeriodEnd1_Mutation01IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_CashFlowStatementDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1PeriodStart02MutationsPeriodEnd1_Mutation02ChangesShortTermCashAndCashEquivalents')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_CashFlowStatementDaebHousingDvi_PrtFST1PeriodStart02MutationsPeriodEnd1_Mutation02ChangesShortTermCashAndCashEquivalents return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
